citation_details.title: Disentangling the origins of confidence in speeded perceptual judgments through multimodal imaging
citation_details.author: M Pereira, N Faivre, I Iturrate
citation_details.venue: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
citation_details.abstract: The human capacity to compute the likelihood that a decision is correct—known as  metacognition—has proven difficult to study in isolation as it usually cooccurs with decision making.
citation_details.short_author: M Pereira, N Faivre, I Iturrate
citation_details.journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
